Working on Mastodon Scaling Sprinkles 💖 

Musician, DJ, fabricator, tinkerer, anti-fascist. Black lives matter.  In tech: sociology, formal methods, systems & safety engineering, treating everything like a database, compiler, or constraint optimization problem. Writing a book on turning around engineering teams when everything is on fire.

I will refer to you ten books! Tell me what you are struggling with at work. Open for mentorship and limited consulting.

“Read don't rediscover"
